name: Stories of Market Research
who_you_serve: Individuals interested in marketing history, including marketers, business professionals, and students.
what_you_do: Market research company with podcast Offers: Podcast (Stories of Market Research)
business_focus: Market research company with podcast Offers: Podcast (Stories of Market Research)
social_proof: Insightrix is a member of the Canadian Research Insights Council (CRIC) and adheres to their standards for public opinion research.
signature_programs: Insightrix offers syndicated reports such as the Saskatchewan Market Intelligence Bundle, Saskatchewan Business Confidence Report, and Saskatchewan Consumer Confidence Tracking Report.
service_provided: market research services, syndicated reports, customer experience, brand research, member research, education research, advertising and communications, strategic studies
